Sentencas: The aim of the present study was a numerical investigation of the efficiency of the combustion process of a novel concept burner under different operating conditions.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel burner to combust anode exhaust gases of SOFC stacks

Sentencas: The design of the burner was a part of the development process of a complete SOFC based system and a challenging combination of technical requirements to be fulfilled.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel burner to combust anode exhaust gases of SOFC stacks

Sentencas: A Computational Fluid Dynamics model of a non-premixed burner was used to simulate combustion of exhaust gases from the anode region of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell stacks.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel burner to combust anode exhaust gases of SOFC stacks

Sentencas: The species concentrations of the exhaust gases were compared with experimental data and a satisfactory agreement of the conversion of hydrocarbons was obtained.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel burner to combust anode exhaust gases of SOFC stacks

Sentencas: This validates the numerical methodology and also proves applicability of the developed approach that quantitatively characterized the interaction between the exhaust gases and burner geometry for proper combustion modelling.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel burner to combust anode exhaust gases of SOFC stacks

Sentencas: Thus, the proposed CFD approach can be safely used for further numerical optimisation of the burner design.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of a novel burner to combust anode exhaust gases of SOFC stacks
